articles.title: Moscow Reminds Indians Of Mumbai Terror Attacks, But Terrorists Had Different Motives In Russia - EurAsian Times
articles.description: The concert hall massacre near Moscow has brought back memories of the 2008 Mumbai terror attacks, and parallels have been drawn between the two terrorist attacks. Footage of the Moscow attack from the shooter’s phone pic.twitter.com/xnW2TOvKUP — What the med…
articles.content:
